content.description: The content of the first post in the thread.

defaultView.description: The default view that the thread will display as.

identityId.description: The identity the original poster will use to create the thread.

accessoryId.description: The accessory that the original poster will use in the thread.

whisper_tags.description: The whisper tags associated with the thread.

index_tags.description: The searchable tags associated with the thread.

content_warnings.description: The content warnings associated with the thread.

category_tags.description: The categories associated with the thread.
